name: Find It Neighborhood
description:
Your neighbors need help! They've misplaced their belongings and have asked you and your friends to find them. You and your mates have made a game out of it: whoever finds the most items within the time limit wins!

WASD Keyboard and controller support.

CREDITS:

Programming: Rorazoro, Stuart Lightfoot, TX549

Animations: Spearmac

Sound Design: Tristan DeMaria (BrikkSteele)
